00010 NPIdentifier ScriptingBridge::id_paint;
00011 
00012 // Method table for use by HasMethod and Invoke.
00013 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Method>*
00014     ScriptingBridge::method_table;
00015 
00016 // Property table for use by {Has|Get|Set|Remove}Property.
00017 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Property>*
00018     ScriptingBridge::property_table;
00019 
00020 // Sets up method_table and property_table.
00021 bool ScriptingBridge::InitializeIdentifiers() {
00022   id_paint = NPN_GetStringIdentifier("paint");
00023 
00024   method_table =
00025       new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>;
00026   if (method_table == NULL) {
00027     return false;
00028   }
00029   
00030   AddMethod("paint", &ScriptingBridge::Paint, id_paint);
00031   
00032   //method_table->insert(
00033   // std::pair<NPIdentifier, Method>(id_paint, &ScriptingBridge::Paint));
00034   //  method_table[id_paint] = &ScriptingBridge::Paint;
00035   
00036   property_table =
00037       new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>;
00038   if (property_table == NULL) {
00039     return false;
00040   }
00041 
00042   return true;
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool ScriptingBridge::AddMethod(std::string meth_name, Method meth, NPIdentifier meth_id){
00046   meth_id = NPN_GetStringIdentifier(meth_name.c_str());  
00047   method_table->insert(
00048       std::pair<NPIdentifier, Method>(meth_id, meth));
00049   //  method_table[id_paint] = &ScriptingBridge::Paint; 
00050   return true;
00051 }

00055 }

00062   if (pi_generator) {
00063     DOUBLE_TO_NPVARIANT(pi_generator->pi(), *result);
00064     return pi_generator->Paint();
00065   }
00066   return false;

00070 // Class-specific implementation of HasMethod, used by the C-style one
00071 // below.
00072 bool ScriptingBridge::HasMethod(NPIdentifier name) {
00073   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00074   i = method_table->find(name);
00075   return i != method_table->end();
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Class-specific implementation of HasProperty, used by the C-style one
00079 // below.
00080 bool ScriptingBridge::HasProperty(NPIdentifier name) {
00081   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00082   i = property_table->find(name);
00083   return i != property_table->end();
00084 }
00085 
00086 // Class-specific implementation of GetProperty, used by the C-style one
00087 // below.
00088 bool ScriptingBridge::GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant *result) {
00089   VOID_TO_NPVARIANT(*result);
00090 
00091   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00092   i = property_table->find(name);
00093   if (i != property_table->end()) {
00094     return (this->*(i->second))(result);
00095   }
00096   return false;
00097 }
00098

00100 // below.
00101 bool ScriptingBridge::SetProperty(NPIdentifier name, const NPVariant* value) {
00102   return false;  // Not implemented.
00103 }

00108   return false;  // Not implemented.

00111 // Class-specific implementation of InvokeDefault, used by the C-style one
00112 // below.
00113 bool ScriptingBridge::InvokeDefault(const NPVariant* args,
00114                                     uint32_t arg_count,
00115                                     NPVariant* result) {
00116   return false;  // Not implemented.

00119 // Class-specific implementation of Invoke, used by the C-style one
00120 // below.
00121 bool ScriptingBridge::Invoke(NPIdentifier name,
00122                              const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00123                              NPVariant* result) {
00124   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00125   i = method_table->find(name);
00126   if (i != method_table->end()) {
00127     return (this->*(i->second))(args, arg_count, result);
00128   }
00129   return false;
00130 }

00133 // below.

00135   // Not implemented.
00136 }

00139 // Called by the browser when a plugin is being destroyed to clean up any
00140 // remaining instances of NPClass.
00141 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00142 void Invalidate(NPObject* object) {
00143   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->Invalidate();
00144 }

00153 // Called by the browser to invoke a function object whose name is |name|.
00154 // Called by NPN_Invoke, declared in npruntime.h
00155 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00156 bool Invoke(NPObject* object, NPIdentifier name,
00157             const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00158             NPVariant* result) {
00159   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->Invoke(
00160       name, args, arg_count, result);
00161 }

00163 // Called by the browser to invoke the default method on an NPObject.
00164 // In this case the default method just returns false.
00165 // Apparently the plugin won't load properly if we simply
00166 // tell the browser we don't have this method.
00167 // Called by NPN_InvokeDefault, declared in npruntime.h
00168 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00169 bool InvokeDefault(NPObject* object, const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00170                    NPVariant* result) {
00171   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->InvokeDefault(
00172       args, arg_count, result);
00173 }
00174

00217 // Called by NPN_ReleaseObject, declared in npruntime.h
00218 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass

00225 // Represents a class's interface, so that the browser knows what functions it
00226 // can call on this plugin object.  The browser can use the methods in this
00227 // class to discover the rest of the plugin's interface.
00228 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00229 NPClass bridge::ScriptingBridge::np_class = {
00230   NP_CLASS_STRUCT_VERSION,
00231   bridge::Allocate,
00232   bridge::Deallocate,
00233   bridge::Invalidate,
00234   bridge::HasMethod,
00235   bridge::Invoke,
00236   bridge::InvokeDefault,
00237   bridge::HasProperty,
00238   bridge::GetProperty,
00239   bridge::SetProperty,
00240   bridge::RemoveProperty
00241 };
